entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 4.
